channel.title: Team TRX on 3HLD
channel.description: Recent content in Team TRX on 3HLD

item.title: TRX CTF 2025
item.description: TRX CTF 2025 Description TheRomanXpl0it is pleased to announce TRX CTF 2025! TRX CTF will be a jeopardy style CTF and last a whole day (24-hours), from the 22nd of February 14:00 UTC, to the 23rd of February 2025 14:00 UTC. The team has made a humongous effort developing interesting challenges in every classic CTF category such as Web, Pwn, Rev and Crypto! We hope you’ll have fun playing the competition!
